sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
stirring
, povzroči, da so ljudje zelo vznemirjeni ali navdušeni.

seg.quote: ...one of the most stirring shots of the whole film.
They must have been stirring times.

sense.def:
There is a stirring of emotion
rečemo, kadar ljudje začutijo neko čustvo.

seg.quote: There was a slight stirring of interest among them.
